titleStmt.title: A letter sent to the Right Honourable William Lenthall Esquire, Speaker to the Honourable House of Commons: concerning the routing of Col: Gorings army neer Bridgewater. With a list of the names of the officers that were taken prisoners at Langport. / By a worthy gentleman in Sir Tho: Fairfax his army. Published by authority.
titleStmt.author: Worthy Gentleman in Sir Thomas Fairfax His Army.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
